Honda NSX Sport Car dengan Teknologi Hybrid
04 Nov 2019, 12:25 by Dian Andryanto, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Tokyo – Tokyo Motor Show atau TMS 2019 yang dihelat sejak 23 Oktober hingga 4 November 2019 ini, masih dipenuhi pengamat dan pencinta otomotif. Tokyo Big Sight tetap ramai di penutupan hari ini.
Begitu pula booith Honda di West Hall 1. Masih menarik perhatian adalah Honda NSX yang dipajang di sana. “Honda NSX itu memadukan konsep produk dengan rasa berkendara sebuah mobil sport dengan performa yang ramah lingkungan,” kata Yulian Karfili, Public Relations and Digital Manager Honda Prospect Motor (HPM).
Menurutnya, sebagai model global, desain dan pengembangan unit daya Sport Hybrid Honda NSX dilakukan di Tochigi, Jepang, sementara desain dan pengembangan pada bodi, sasis, kelistrikanserta desain interior dilakukan di Raymond, Ohio, Amerika Serikat.
Desain awal untuk Honda NSX dilakukan di Wako, Jepang, dan kemudian dikembangkan lagi untuk diproduksi oleh Acura Design Studio di Los Angeles, Amerika Serikat. Proses riset dan pengembangan dilakukan selama empat tahun dengan melakukan pengujian di jalanan dan sirkuit.
“Honda NSX adalah produk yang paling merepresentasikan karakter Honda yang sporty, sekaligus komitmen terhadap pelestarian lingkungan. Secara tampilan dan performa, NSX sangat kental dengan aura sporty yang selalu menjadi karakter dasar dari setiap produk Honda, namun mobil ini dibekali dengan mesin hybrid yang ramah lingkungan,” kata Yulian Karfili.
Honda NSX didukung oleh tiga Motor Sport Hybrid dengan mesin Twin-Turbocharged DOHC V6. Maksimal total tenaga Honda NSX 2019 adaah 573 hp. Honda NSX menghadirkan akselerasi linier dan kuat yang disempurnakan melalui penciptaan Sport Hybrid SH-AWD (Super Handling All-Wheel Drive).
Sport Hybrid SH-AWD menggunakan motor listrik untuk membantu akselerasi, pengereman, dan menikung. Dengan vektor torsi bertenaga listrik yang disediakan oleh Twin Motor Unit yang dipasang di depan, Honda NSX membawa teknologi Super Handling All-Wheel Drive ke dimensi baru dengan menggunakan distribusi torsi motor listrik yang dinamis, seketika dan berkesinambungan untuk meningkatkan presisi penanganan dan kinerja menikung dalam semua situasi mengemudi.
Secara dimensi, mobil ini memiliki wheelbase 2.630 mm dengan panjang 4.470 mm dan lebar 2.217 mm dengan komponen sasis, ban dan penyetelan perangkat lunak yang telah dimodifikasi untuk menghasilkan Honda NSX yang lebih responsif terhadap pengemudi untuk penggunaan harian hingga ke sirkuit. Untuk keseimbangan dan kendali Honda NSX juga telah meningkat sehingga memungkinkan pengemudi untuk lebih mengatur understeer dan oversteer dengan input throttle yang halus. Perubahan tersebut menghasilkan waktu putaran 2 detik lebih cepat dalam pengujian di Sirkuit Suzuka, Jepang.
S. DIAN ANDRYANTO (TOKYO)

Honda NSX Sport Car with Hybrid Technology
04 Nov 2019, 12:25 by Dian Andryanto, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Tokyo - The Tokyo Motor Show or TMS 2019, held from October 23 to November 4, 2019, is still full of automotive observers and lovers. Tokyo Big Sight remains crowded at the close today.
Similarly, Honda booith at West Hall 1. Still attracting attention is the Honda NSX on display there. "The Honda NSX combines the concept of the product with the sense of driving a sports car with environmentally friendly performance," said Yulian Karfili, Public Relations and Digital Manager of Honda Prospect Motor (HPM).
According to him, as a global model, the design and development of the Honda NSX Sport Hybrid power unit was carried out in Tochigi, Japan, while the design and development of the body, chassis, electricity and interior design were carried out in Raymond, Ohio, United States.
The initial design for the Honda NSX was carried out in Wako, Japan, and then further developed to be produced by Acura Design Studio in Los Angeles, United States. The research and development process was carried out for four years by conducting tests on the streets and circuits.
"The Honda NSX is the product that best represents Honda's sporty character, as well as its commitment to environmental preservation. In appearance and performance, NSX is very thick with a sporty aura that has always been the basic character of every Honda product, but this car is equipped with a hybrid engine that is environmentally friendly, "said Yulian Karfili.
Honda NSX is powered by three Hybrid Sport Motors with a DOHC V6 Twin-Turbocharged engine. The maximum total power of the Honda NSX 2019 is 573 hp. Honda NSX presents linear and strong acceleration that is enhanced through the creation of the Sport Hybrid SH-AWD (Super Handling All-Wheel Drive).
The SH-AWD Sport Hybrid uses an electric motor to help accelerate, braking, and cornering. With an electric-powered torque vector provided by the front mounted Twin Motor Unit, the Honda NSX brings Super Handling All-Wheel Drive technology to a new dimension using dynamic, instantaneous and continuous torque distribution of electric motors to improve handling precision and cornering performance in all driving situation.
Dimensionally, this car has a wheelbase of 2,630 mm with a length of 4,470 mm and a width of 2,217 mm with chassis components, tires and software tuning that has been modified to produce a Honda NSX that is more responsive to the driver for daily use to the circuit. For balance and control the Honda NSX has also been increased to enable the driver to better manage understeer and oversteer with smooth throttle input. This change results in a 2 second lap time that is faster in testing at the Suzuka Circuit, Japan.
S. DIAN ANDRYANTO (TOKYO)
